What this is:

This prototype isolates styles for sticky-footer, header and inner-header flex-box.

Included is drop-down navigation for BS-04. This navigation relies on styles from sisiharmoni-bs04.css 060116 (red) and cwebba_bootstrap_0503b2.css (select BS-04 styles).
